front.title: LDP Extensions for Pseudo Wire (PW) Transfer in an MPLS-TP Network

abstract.t: As defined in [RFC5654] MPLS-TP transport path includes LSP and PW.And the possibility of transferring the ownership and control of anexisting and in-use path between the management plane and the controlplane, without actually affecting data plane traffic being carriedover it, is a valuable option for carrier. [RFC5493] and [RFC5852]describe the LSP transfer. This memo gives the requirement and LDPextensions for PW transfer in an MPLS-TP network.
